titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide 2020 recovery rebates to certain individuals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill modifies the requirement for valid identification numbers for taxpayers claiming a 2020 recovery rebate (the stimulus payment provided to taxpayers in response to the COVID-19 [i.e., coronavirus disease 2019] pandemic). Specifically, it allows married taxpayers to claim the rebate if at least one spouse satisfies the identification requirement.
